title: Looking for the VSCOcam Typeface (Sans Serif)
content:
I downloaded the VSCOcam iphone app and discovered its beautiful typeface.  
Honestly, i cant get it over it. Curious as to whether anyone would possibly know what typeface it is?  
If you need a better look, you can head over to their website [http://vsco.co](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227162730/http:/vsco.co/).

I dont have a lot of knowledge on typefaces, so any help would be appreciated.  
Thanks

comments.content: You are a genius, thank you
